introduction: Midnight Delight is a comedy film set in a smoking lounge. It features nine vignettes of comedy, wit and reality that follows strangers in high spirits, crossing paths during nights of exploration. These curious visitors reflect on daily existence, societal curiosities, conversing about various topics. Discussion includes topics varying from "why do we talk" to "what do models eat", "if water makes us fat", to "if dolphins could be the reason for the inception of the entire universe or its destruction" moving to even hats, moisturizer, maths, infinity, working out at the gym, dating games and health supplements.
